name: Stickman 1-on-1 Dodgeball
description:
Remember the 4 D's of Dodgeball? Duck, dip, dive and dodge!

Get in on some 1 on 1 Dodgeball action with this addicting new Stickman game. Master your skills in multiple game modes and try to become the top Dodgeballer worldwide.

***Features:***
• Classic Mode: First one to 5 wins in this one-minute timed game.
• Endless Mode: When you just want to relax and dodge some balls. No time limit or score limit.
• Underdog Mode: Defeat the opponent by scoring 5 hits... but GAME OVER if you get hit!
• Collect coins on the court and use them to upgrade skills and unlock uniforms
• Lots of leaderboards & achievements to compete for accuracy, win percentage, and more.

Pick up and play with simple controls:
• Use the D-pad to move.
• Dodge the ball by swiping up to dive and down to slide.
• Throw the ball by swiping in the direction you want to throw.

Time to get on the court. Download now for free!

If you like Stickman 1-on-1 Dodgeball, check out some of our other popular Stickman games with millions of players worldwide!
*Stickman Trampoline FREE
*Stickman High Diving FREE
*Stickman World Tour High Diving
